item.title: How do i change background on pwnscape client?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

Create a background and then delete old save the new one as the same name, and file type.

item.source: How do i change background on pwnscape client?

item.title: How do i change background on pwnscape client?
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Thats not how I did it Fox, To actually find the background image,

Go into your client then ‘Files > Spirts’. Then your in a folder with lots of pictures, you will see one close to the bottem called “title”.

Just edit that. I also noticed that half of the picture was flipped, so when done editing, highlight half the picture and just choose flip.

Thats how i did it and i am also using Pwnscape.

Read full topic

coco zezima:

How do i change background on pwnscape client?

Well if you want to make your own custom background from scratch look the the pgn image (background) then go right click on it and click edit using paint or whatever to make your own
